Uses of Interface
org.greatage.ioc.ServiceBindingOptions

Packages that use ServiceBindingOptions
org.greatage.ioc This package represents all base Great Age IoC container classes. 
 

Uses of ServiceBindingOptions in org.greatage.ioc
 

Classes in org.greatage.ioc that implement ServiceBindingOptions
 class ServiceBindingOptionsImpl<T>
          This class represents default ServiceBindingOptions implementation that is used to define service unique id, service scope and is it overrides the existing service.
